About the Company: Dalmia Bharat Enterprises Limited was incorporated as Sri Kesava Mines & Minerals Limited on February 10, 2006, as a public limited company as a wholly owned subsidiary of Dalmia Cement (Bharat) Limited (DCBL). It is engaged in the business of cement, refractories and power. The Company operates in three segments: Own Manufactured Cement, Refractory, Management Services and Others. The Own Manufactured Cement segment includes manufacture and marketing of cement. The Refractory segment includes marketing of refractory products. It mainly caters to markets in southern India..The company also in the business segment of Management Services.
